alert.note: Alert for Gila; Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 7:29AM MST until February 22 at 7:45AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM MST FOR GILA AND MARICOPA COUNTIES... At 729 AM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Tonto Basin to near Four Peaks to near Canyon Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt, Canyon Lake, Tonto Basin, Tonto National Monument, Roosevelt Dam, Four Peaks, Apache Lake and Tortilla Flat. This includes AZ Route 188 between mile markers 238 and 259. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
